alert.note: Alert for Pennington; Red Lake (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 23 at 1:42PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Red Lake and central Pennington Counties through 215 PM CDT... At 141 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms over Plummer, or 17 miles south of Thief River Falls, moving northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Thief River Falls, Oklee, Plummer, St. Hilaire, Brooks, Terrebonne and Hazel. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
